title: Suspect a poisoning? Get expert help. Use the webPOISONCONTROL online tool, or call. Both optio
description: Get free Poison Control help online or call 800-222-1222 if you swallow, splash, or get stung by something that may be harmful.
cleaned_text: Contact Poison Control right away if you suspect a poisoning. Help is available online with [webPOISONCONTROL®](https://triage.webpoisoncontrol.org/#/exclusions) or by phone at 1-800-222-1222. Both options are free, expert, and confidential. Do Your Part Poison Control reduces poisoning-related ER visits, a critical part of preserving valuable healthcare resources for coronavirus (COVID-19) care. Do your part to reduce unnecessary ER visits by saving Poison Control's contact information. To downlaod our vcard, text poison to 202-677-7600. The vcard has the Poison Control telephone number and the link to online help. Save Poison Control
